text: Edith Mathis (11 February 1938 â€“ 9 February 2025) was a Swiss soprano who was known for her Mozart's operas."South African soprano Pumeza Matshikiza takes the world stage". Surry Hills, New South Wales, Australia: The Australian, 24 August 2016. She also took part in Henze's Der junge Lord. Mathis died on 9 February 2025, two days before her 87th birthday. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Sopranos Category:Swiss singers Category:People from Lucerne
title: Edith Mathis
